great fun as long as you can deal with trolls on a semi regular basis .. muting helps a lot! and an awesome warm up for any fps gaming session .. the gold standard if you will  .. helps a lot with Tarkov for example .. just run a few deathmatches before going into which ever game is your favourite.. really helps to dial in your aim and reaction times
